titleStmt.title: Englands choice, &c. to all arch-bishops, and bishops who are not a shame (to) or ashamed (of) the name of Christ before men, grace, wisdom and truth, from God our Father, and from Our Lord Jesus Christ, Amen.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
